start.text: It be time for battle, lads.

start_boss.text: Arr, that be the mighty Leviathan!
Just another head t'mount in me cabin!

retreat.text: Time t'leave while we still can!
Honor is livin' t'fight another day!

out_of_missiles.text: We do be fresh out o'torpedoes.

engaged.text: I can see th'whites o' their eyes.

need_help.text: To me, lads! We're sunk if we don't push through!

running.text: Ye'll never take Captain Tannen alive!
Pull back, don't let 'em overtake us!

hull_50.text: Keep steady, lads! She's holdin' together!

overload.text: Which o'ye louts overloaded the capacitors?!
Git me ship runnin' or someone's walkin' the plank!

death.text: That ain't the last ye've seen o' me!
